text: Yohanes Rendy Sugiarto (born 16 August 1991) is an Indonesian male badminton player from PB Djarum badminton club. He was the boys' doubles gold medalist at the 2009 Asian Junior Badminton Championships partnered with Angga Pratama. == Achievements == === Summer Universiade === Men's doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" ! |Year ! |Venue ! |Partner ! |Opponent ! |Score ! |Result |- | align="center"|2011 | align="left"|Gymnasium of SZIIT, Shenzen, China | align="left"| Afiat Yuris Wirawan | align="left"| Fang Chieh- min Lee Sheng-mu | align="left"|18–21, 15–21 | style="text-align:left; background:white"|Bronze Bronze |} === BWF World Junior championships === Boys' Doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !|Year !|Venue !|Partner !|Opponent !|Score !|Result |- |- style="background:#98FB98" |align="centr"|2009 |align="left"|Stadium Sultan Abdul Halim, Alor Setar, Malaysia |align="left"| Angga Pratama |align="left"| Chooi Kah Ming Ow Yao Han |align="left"|21–13, 15–21, 18–21 |style="text-align:left; background:white"|Bronze Bronze |- |} === Asia Junior championships === Boys' Doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !|Year !|Venue !|Partner !|Opponent !|Score !|Result |- |- style="background:#AABBCC" |align="centr"|2009 |align="left"|Stadium Juara, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia |align="left"| Angga Pratama |align="left"| Ow Yao Han Yew Hong Kheng |align="left"|21–15, 21–16 |style="text-align:left; background:white"|Gold Gold |- |} === BWF Grand Prix === The BWF Grand Prix has two level such as Grand Prix and Grand Prix Gold. It is a series of badminton tournaments, sanctioned by Badminton World Federation (BWF) since 2007. Men's Doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !|Year !|Tournament !|Partner !|Opponent !|Score !|Result |- style="background:#D4F1C5" |align="center"|2012 |align="left"|Vietnam Open |align="left"| Afiat Yuris Wirawan |align="left"| Bodin Issara Maneepong Jongjit |align="left"|21-19, 16-21, 11-21 |style="text-align:left; background:white"| Runner-up |- |} : BWF Grand Prix Gold tournament : BWF Grand Prix tournament === BWF International Challenge/Series === Men's Doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !|Year !|Tournament !|Partner !|Opponent !|Score !|Result |- style="background:#D8CEF6" |align="center"|2014 |align="left"|Bahrain International Challenge |align="left"| Afiat Yuris Wirawan |align="left"| Fran Kurniawan Agripinna Prima Rahmanto Putra |align="left"|23–21, 21–15 |style="text- align:left; background:white"| Winner |- |- style="background:#D5D5D5" |align="center"|2014 |align="left"|USM Indonesia International |align="left"| Afiat Yuris Wirawan |align="left"| Seiko Wahyu Kusdianto Tedi Supriadi |align="left"|21–18, 21–17 |style="text-align:left; background:white"| Winner |- |} : BWF International Challenge tournament : BWF International Series tournament == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:1991 births Category:People from Banyumas Regency Category:Sportspeople from Central Java Category:Indonesian male badminton players Category:Universiade medalists in badminton Category:Universiade gold medalists for Indonesia Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Indonesia Category:Medalists at the 2011 Summer Universiade
title: Yohanes Rendy Sugiarto
